Publish.LongDescription:
# Spanish Vanilla Theme Overrider Hallo and Hello. This is a Vanilla Theme Overrider that turns Vanilla Signs, Roadmarkings Decals to Spanish ones. This Overrider uses the Traffic Type Spain Font. Can be found [here](https://www.onlinewebfonts.com/download/f820971323ed634d5ef50513e34fbd3c).
**Please use one Vanilla Overrider at one time!**
---
## Functions - Works **automaticly**, you don't need any knowledge whatsoever! - Dynamic working Street Signs - Static Bus/Tram Signs - Bicycle Parking Spots
